code:
The following is a step-by-step guide to generate a port scan reconnaissance:

Step 1: Identify the target machine(s)
To generate a port scan reconnaissance, identify the targets and their ports. To do this, you can either manually find the machines you want to investigate or use a tool like FTP Scan, PortScanner or NetSurf.

Step 2: Choose a port range for your scan
Choosing the correct port range is crucial to ensure that you cover all available ports. Use a high percentage of ports at the start of the range to ensure that you will discover all exposed TCP and UDP ports.

Step 3: Create a text
